summary: Hunt Powers is being chased by a bounty hunter when he rides into a town controlled by a very nasty mine-owner and very much in need of justice.
cast: Jack Betts|Franco Borelli|Benito Pacifico|Attilio Dottesio|Simonetta Vitelli|Pietro Fumelli|Amerigo Castrighella|Gordon Mitchell|Ettore Manni|Manlio Salvatori|Eugenio Galadini|Mila Vitelli Valenza|Mario Capuccio|Giglio Gigli|Giulio Baraghini|Mario Dardanelli|Marcello Meconizzi
title: Inginocchiati straniero... I cadaveri non fanno ombra!
